products.title: Verona Prime 25mm Black Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A classic shade, this black perfect fit venetian blind adds an modern look to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.

products.title: Turin 25mm Jet Black Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their range of turin 25mm aluminium perfect fit venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. This jet black perfect fit venetian blind adds a bold black shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wooden accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with upvc windows and doors, as they are drill and screw-free - perfect for protecting the frame warranty.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Black Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their black colour - a perfect bold choice for any room that you want to dim the light in a little more.
